# f5distributedcloud_api_credential (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_api_credential` data source retrieves information about an existing API credential.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_api_credential" "example" {
  name      = "my-api-credential"
  namespace = "system"
}

output "credential_type" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_api_credential.example.credential_type
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the API credential to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the API credential is located.

### Read-Only

- `credential_type` (String) Type of the API credential.
- `description` (String) Description of the API credential.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the API credential.
